member.name: DEFAULT_FOLDER_MENU_RESTRICTIONS
member.summary: Defines shortcut menu restrictions used by and .

member.name: DEFAULT_FOLDER_MENU_RESTRICTIONS.DFMR_NO_STATIC_VERBS
member.summary: 0x0008. Don't use the handler for static verbs.

member.name: DEFAULT_FOLDER_MENU_RESTRICTIONS.DFMR_STATIC_VERBS_ONLY
member.summary: 0x0010. Static verbs only. No dynamic IContextMenu verbs allowed.

member.name: DEFAULT_FOLDER_MENU_RESTRICTIONS.DFMR_NO_RESOURCE_VERBS
member.summary: 0x0020. Don't add verbs for cut, copy, paste, link, delete, rename, or properties.

member.name: DEFAULT_FOLDER_MENU_RESTRICTIONS.DFMR_OPTIN_HANDLERS_ONLY
member.summary: 0x0040. Opt-in to load handler for partial cloud files. Only used for handlers that will not cause implicit hydration. Opt-in handlers must have the registry value "ContextMenuOptIn" under HKCR\CLSID<handler clsid>

member.name: DEFAULT_FOLDER_MENU_RESTRICTIONS.DFMR_RESOURCE_AND_FOLDER_VERBS_ONLY
member.summary: 0x0080. Only load resource verbs (cut, copy, paste, link, delete, rename, and properties) and folder verbs added by .

member.name: DEFAULT_FOLDER_MENU_RESTRICTIONS.DFMR_USE_SPECIFIED_HANDLERS
member.summary: 0x0100. Use handlers with CLSID values that were added through

member.name: DEFAULT_FOLDER_MENU_RESTRICTIONS.DFMR_USE_SPECIFIED_VERBS
member.summary: 0x0200. Only load handlers that support the specified verbs.

member.name: DEFAULT_FOLDER_MENU_RESTRICTIONS.DFMR_NO_NATIVECPU_VERBS
member.summary: 0x0800. Ignore verbs that are registered for the native CPU architecture.
